statements: SELECT * FROM books WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE genre = 'Mystery';
SELECT author, genre FROM books WHERE availability = FALSE;
SELECT book_id, title FROM books WHERE author = 'Jane Doe';
SELECT * FROM books ORDER BY genre DESC, title ASC;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE genre = 'Mystery' AND availability = TRUE;
SELECT title, author, genre FROM books WHERE availability = FALSE ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT title, author, genre FROM books WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE genre IN ('Fantasy', 'Sci-Fi') AND availability = TRUE LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(book_id) AS total_books, genre FROM books GROUP BY genre HAVING total_books > 10 ORDER BY total_books DESC;
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author_id, release_date FROM books WHERE genre = 'Fiction';
SELECT title, author_name, nationality FROM books b JOIN authors a ON b.author_id = a.author_id;
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE nationality = 'American' ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT title, release_date FROM books WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM books WHERE genre = 'Fiction';
SELECT title, author_name FROM books b JOIN authors a ON b.author_id = a.author_id;
SELECT title, release_date FROM books WHERE genre = 'Mystery' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, nationality FROM authors WHERE birth_date < '1980-01-01';
SELECT b.title, a.author_name, b.release_date FROM books b JOIN authors a ON b.author_id = a.author_id WHERE a.nationality = 'American';
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author_id FROM books WHERE availability = 1;
SELECT author_name, nationality FROM authors WHERE author_id = 3;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres ORDER BY genre_name DESC;
SELECT title, author_name FROM books JOIN authors ON books.author_id = authors.author_id;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE availability = 1 ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT title, author_name FROM books b JOIN authors a ON b.author_id = a.author_id;
SELECT title, genre_name FROM books b JOIN genres g ON b.genre_id = g.genre_id WHERE b.availability = 1;
SELECT * FROM books b WHERE b.genre_id = (SELECT genre_id FROM genres WHERE genre_name = 'Mystery');
SELECT AVG(availability) AS avg_availability FROM books;
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author_id FROM books WHERE genre_id = 2;
SELECT author_name FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT book_id, title, author_id, genre_id FROM books WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT title, author_id FROM books WHERE genre_id = 1 ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE author_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY author_id;
SELECT title, genre_name FROM books INNER JOIN genres ON books.genre_id = genres.genre_id WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY genre_name, title;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(book_id) AS total_books FROM authors LEFT JOIN books ON authors.author_id = books.author_id GROUP BY author_name ORDER BY total_books DESC;

SELECT books.title, availability.available_amount FROM books INNER JOIN availability ON books.book_id = availability.book_id WHERE availability.available_amount > 0 ORDER BY availability.available_amount DESC, books.title;
SELECT * FROM books
SELECT title, author_id FROM books
SELECT author_id, title, availability FROM books
SELECT id, title, genre_id FROM books
SELECT * FROM authors
SELECT id, title, author_id, genre_id, availability FROM books
SELECT * FROM books WHERE availability = true
SELECT title, name, nationality FROM books JOIN authors ON books.author_id = authors.id
SELECT b.title, a.name AS author_name, g.name AS genre_name FROM books b JOIN authors a ON b.author_id = a.id JOIN genres g ON b.genre_id = g.id
SELECT b.title, ba.author_id, a.name as author_name FROM books b JOIN books_authors ba ON b.id = ba.book_id JOIN authors a ON ba.author_id = a.id
